about_the_game: Novus Campis is a space strategy game where you have to manage a base, wich has to gain a certain level of influence, to win the game. To do so you will have to survive events, wich will threaten the saftey and economy of your base. You can put points into randomly generated skilltrees and items or convert less useful items, with the help of the transmuter, into more useful ones. You will also explore space and build connections with other civilization to strengthen your economy and defence. To win you will have to make smart strategic decisions, to survive the increasingly more difficult events and build your base into prosperity.
